appDesc.message: Mado is a Markdown editor application. You can use it to take notes, write blog posts or edit documents.

helpHeadersExample.message:
Six sizes available, the size depends on the numbers of #.

Big title (size 1, the biggest).

A less impresive title (size 4 on 6).

helpHeadersResult.message:
Six sizes available, the size depends on the numbers of #.
#Big title (size 1, the biggest).
####A less impresive title (size 4 on 6).

helpBoldItalicResult.message: **_ bold italic_** or *__bold italic__* or ***this*** or ___this___

helpOrderedListsResult.message:
1. First ordered list item.
2. Another item.

helpUnorderedListsExample.message:
• An item.
  • A second item (you can also use + or -).

helpUnorderedListsResult.message:
* An item.
* A second item (you can also use + or -).

helpInlineStyleLinksResult.message:
[Hypertext](https://github.com/ArmandGrillet/Mado)
(Can be used to create an anchor.)

helpCodeExample.message:
Write your code between three back-ticks to make a block of code.
You can also write code by indent your text with four spaces.

helpCodeResult.message:
```Text between three back-ticks is a block of code.```
    Text after four spaces is also a block of code.

helpBlockquotesExample.message: Blockquotes only need > to work. To separate two blockquotes, insert a blank line between them.

helpBlockquotesResult.message:
> Blockquotes only need > to work.

> Two blockquotes without a break (a line who isn't a blockquote) are a single quote.

helpHorizontaleRulesExample.message: <hr> You can use Hyphens, asterisks or underscores.<hr>

helpHorizontaleRulesResult.message:
***
You can use Hyphens, asterisks or underscores.
---

helpLineBreaksExample.message:
To separate two paragraphs, press Enter twice.

And you have a new paragraph!

helpLineBreaksResult.message:
To separate two paragraphs, press Enter twice.

And you have a new paragraph.

helpTablesExample.message:
Tables Are Cool
col 3 is right-aligned $13
col 2 is centered $37

helpTablesResult.message:
| Tables  | Are               | Cool  |
| -------- |:----------------:| ------:|
| col 3 is | right-aligned | $13    |
| col 2 is | centered       | $37    |

helpQuestionExample.message: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'.

msgFirstLaunch.message:
# Dear user,

Thanks for installing **Mado**. For your first launch, here is some information:

* Mado handles .md, .markdown and .txt files, can save these files as .md (the official extension for Markdown files) and offers an export in .html.
* You can click the number of words in the bottom-right corner to see the number of characters in your document (and *vice versa*). Click the eye icon next to it to change the style of the HTML view.
* See the keyboard shortcuts (top-right button, “Shortcuts” section) to use Mado in depth.

I hope you will enjoy Mado,

**[Armand Grillet](http://armand.gr/)**

***

P.S. This message will not appear anymore. Click “New” in the navbar to start using Mado.

htmlUnsavedChangesText.message: This document has unsaved changes. Do you want to save these changes before exiting?
